name: Knight Bewitched
description: Follow the tale of Ruth, fearless knight of Halonia, and Gwen, feisty witch of the Underbog. As the two and their companions journey together to save the world, love begins to ignite in Ruth's heart. But is this true love, or is Ruth truly bewitched?
minimum_requirements: OS: XP and above Processor: 2.4GHz quad-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space
